Title: Bulletin of glad tidings
Notes: A certificate handed out to middle school graduates dispatched to work in the countryside. The blanks needed to be filled in, detailing the names of the school and of the graduate.The Mao quote on the right reads "All those intellectuals who can go to the countryside must happily do so. In the great world of the countryside, they can show their worth".
Theme: Up to the mountains, down to the villages (1968)
